Race.SpecificTitle: PW Police Jury (Vet.) -- Disabled Vet. Homestead Exemp. -PJ
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Disabled Veterans Homestead Exemption)

Summary:  Authorizes an additional homestead exemption in the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and their surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution.
Race.FullText: Shall an additional homestead exemption be authorized in the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana, for certain disabled veterans and surviving spouses in accordance with and subject to the provisions of Article VII, Section 21(K) of the Louisiana Constitution, provided that this additional homestead exemption shall extend and apply to property in Avoyelles Parish only after approval by a majority of the registered voters of Avoyelles Parish voting on this proposition?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drain. Dist. #1 -- Acreage Tax - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District #1 Proposition
(Acreage Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Authority for Gravity Drainage District #1 to impose, levy and collect for a period of ten (10) years an acreage tax or force contribution of thirty-five cents per acre on each and every acre of land in the District for the purpose of maintaining, improving and keeping in repair the gravity drainage system in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Gravity Drainage District #1 of the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to impose, levy and collect for a term of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, an acreage tax or force contribution of thirty-five cents ($.35) per acre on each and every acre of land in the District (an estimated $14,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the acreage tax for an entire year), for the purpose of maintaining, improving and keeping in repair the gravity drainage system in the District?
